instructions_to_main_agent: 2. GLOBAL CSS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css. Set body background to #FDFCF8.
4. STATE: Use a simple Context or Zustand store to hold: guestName, photoBlob, message.
5. ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for page transitions (fade in/up). All inputs should have smooth focus transitions.
6. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply the 'glassmorphism.card' class logic to all main containers. Ensure text contrast is high (Stone-900).
7. DECORATION: Add a fixed background texture div with low opacity to give the 'paper' feel.
8. ADMIN: Simple password protection (mocked is fine). Allow downloading the 'memory' view as PDF (use html2canvas + jspdf).
9. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have labels (even if visually hidden) and focus states are visible.
universal_guidelines: All interactive elements must have data-testid.
